title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 6 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 6 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: But Job answered and said,
lineList.cn: 约伯回答说，

lineList.en: Oh that my grief were throughly weighed, and my calamity laid in the balances together!
lineList.cn: 惟愿我的烦恼称一称，我一切的灾害放在天平里。

lineList.en: For now it would be heavier than the sand of the sea: therefore my words are swallowed up.
lineList.cn: 现今都比海沙更重，所以我的言语急躁。

lineList.en: For the arrows of the Almighty are within me, the poison whereof drinketh up my spirit: the terrors of God do set themselves in array against me.
lineList.cn: 因全能者的箭射入我身，其毒，我的灵喝尽了。神的惊吓摆阵攻击我。

lineList.en: Doth the wild ass bray when he hath grass? or loweth the ox over his fodder?
lineList.cn: 野驴有草岂能叫唤，牛有料，岂能吼叫。

lineList.en: Can that which is unsavoury be eaten without salt? or is there any taste in the white of an egg?
lineList.cn: 物淡而无盐岂可吃吗，蛋青有什么滋味呢。

lineList.en: The things that my soul refused to touch are as my sorrowful meat.
lineList.cn: 看为可厌的食物，我心不肯挨近。

lineList.en: Oh that I might have my request; and that God would grant me the thing that I long for!
lineList.cn: 惟愿我得着所求的，愿神赐我所切望的。

lineList.en: Even that it would please God to destroy me; that he would let loose his hand, and cut me off!
lineList.cn: 就是愿神把我压碎，伸手将我剪除。

lineList.en: Then should I yet have comfort; yea, I would harden myself in sorrow: let him not spare; for I have not concealed the words of the Holy One.
lineList.cn: 我因没有违弃那圣者的言语，就仍以此为安慰，在不止息的痛苦中还可踊跃。

lineList.en: What is my strength, that I should hope? and what is mine end, that I should prolong my life?
lineList.cn: 我有什么气力使我等候。我有什么结局使我忍耐。

lineList.en: Is my strength the strength of stones? or is my flesh of brass?
lineList.cn: 我的气力岂是石头的气力。我的肉身岂是铜的呢。

lineList.en: Is not my help in me? and is wisdom driven quite from me?
lineList.cn: 在我岂不是毫无帮助吗。智慧岂不是从我心中赶出净尽吗。

lineList.en: To him that is afflicted pity should be shewed from his friend; but he forsaketh the fear of the Almighty.
lineList.cn: 那将要灰心，离弃全能者，不敬畏神的人，他的朋友当以慈爱待他。

lineList.en: My brethren have dealt deceitfully as a brook, and as the stream of brooks they pass away;
lineList.cn: 我的弟兄诡诈，好像溪水，又像溪水流乾的河道。

lineList.en: Which are blackish by reason of the ice, and wherein the snow is hid:
lineList.cn: 这河因结冰发黑，有雪藏在其中。

lineList.en: What time they wax warm, they vanish: when it is hot, they are consumed out of their place.
lineList.cn: 天气渐暖就随时消化，日头炎热便从原处乾涸。

lineList.en: The paths of their way are turned aside; they go to nothing, and perish.
lineList.cn: 结伴的客旅离弃大道，顺河偏行，到荒野之地死亡。

lineList.en: The troops of Tema looked, the companies of Sheba waited for them.
lineList.cn: 提玛结伴的客旅瞻望。示巴同夥的人等候。

lineList.en: They were confounded because they had hoped; they came thither, and were ashamed.
lineList.cn: 他们因失了盼望就抱愧，来到那里便蒙羞。

lineList.en: For now ye are nothing; ye see my casting down, and are afraid.
lineList.cn: 现在你们正是这样，看见惊吓的事便惧怕。

lineList.en: Did I say, Bring unto me? or, Give a reward for me of your substance?
lineList.cn: 我岂说，请你们供给我，从你们的财物中送礼物给我。

lineList.en: Or, Deliver me from the enemy's hand? or, Redeem me from the hand of the mighty?
lineList.cn: 岂说，拯救我脱离敌人的手吗。救赎我脱离强暴人的手吗。

lineList.en: Teach me, and I will hold my tongue: and cause me to understand wherein I have erred.
lineList.cn: 请你们教导我，我便不作声。使我明白在何事上有错。

lineList.en: How forcible are right words! but what doth your arguing reprove?
lineList.cn: 正直的言语力量何其大。但你们责备是责备什么呢。

lineList.en: Do ye imagine to reprove words, and the speeches of one that is desperate, which are as wind?
lineList.cn: 绝望人的讲论既然如风，你们还想要驳正言语吗。

lineList.en: Yea, ye overwhelm the fatherless, and ye dig a pit for your friend.
lineList.cn: 你们想为孤儿拈阄，以朋友当货物。

lineList.en: Now therefore be content, look upon me; for it is evident unto you if I lie.
lineList.cn: 现在请你们看看我，我决不当面说谎。

lineList.en: Return, I pray you, let it not be iniquity; yea, return again, my righteousness is in it.
lineList.cn: 请你们转意，不要不公。请再转意，我的事有理。

lineList.en: Is there iniquity in my tongue? cannot my taste discern perverse things?
lineList.cn: 我的舌上岂有不义吗。我的口里岂不辨奸恶吗。
